name: Phishing Master
description: Awarded for mastering the art of identifying phishing attempts.

name: Quiz Initiate
description: Awarded for completing your first quiz.

name: Perfectionist
description: Awarded for achieving a perfect 100% score on any quiz.

name: On a Roll
description: Awarded for passing 3 quizzes in a row.

name: Hot Streak
description: Awarded for passing 5 quizzes in a row.

name: Password Fortress
description: Awarded for mastering quizzes on password security.

name: Social Savvy
description: Awarded for excelling in social engineering awareness quizzes.

name: Network Ninja
description: Awarded for acing quizzes about network security.

name: Malware Mangler
description: Awarded for expertise in identifying and understanding malware.

name: Diligent Reviewer
description: Awarded for using the 'Review Missed Questions' feature for the first time.

name: Speed Demon
description: Awarded for completing a quiz in under 2 minutes.
